title: [BUG/Advance indexing] illegal indexing succeed
body_html:
import torch as th
print(th.__version__)

x = th.rand(2,4)
print(x)

try:
    print(x[0, [0,1,2,3,4]])
except RuntimeError as e:
    print(e)

print(x[range(1), [0,1,2,3,4]])  # illegal but succeed
0.4.0
tensor([[ 0.6197,  0.7037,  0.6312,  0.3241],
        [ 0.8834,  0.5856,  0.3698,  0.7303]])
invalid argument 2: out of range: 4 out of 4 at /pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:430
tensor([ 0.6197,  0.7037,  0.6312,  0.3241,  0.8834])
body_text:
import torch as th
print(th.__version__)

x = th.rand(2,4)
print(x)

try:
    print(x[0, [0,1,2,3,4]])
except RuntimeError as e:
    print(e)

print(x[range(1), [0,1,2,3,4]])  # illegal but succeed
0.4.0
tensor([[ 0.6197,  0.7037,  0.6312,  0.3241],
        [ 0.8834,  0.5856,  0.3698,  0.7303]])
invalid argument 2: out of range: 4 out of 4 at /pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:430
tensor([ 0.6197,  0.7037,  0.6312,  0.3241,  0.8834])
body:
```python3
import torch as th
print(th.__version__)

x = th.rand(2,4)
print(x)

try:
    print(x[0, [0,1,2,3,4]])
except RuntimeError as e:
    print(e)

print(x[range(1), [0,1,2,3,4]])  # illegal but succeed
```

```
0.4.0
tensor([[ 0.6197,  0.7037,  0.6312,  0.3241],
        [ 0.8834,  0.5856,  0.3698,  0.7303]])
invalid argument 2: out of range: 4 out of 4 at /pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:430
tensor([ 0.6197,  0.7037,  0.6312,  0.3241,  0.8834])
```
